question: 催告
sourceMnemonic: When you <kanji>sponsor</kanji> an <kanji>announce</kanji>ment, you're allowing those you're sponsoring to create some kind of <vocabulary>notification</vocabulary> for all those they want to get in contact with.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
